page.title: 19TRANSPORT IN WALKINGTON.
page.content: VIRTUALLY ALL RESIDENTS OF OUR AREA HAVE ONE CAR,MANY HAVE A SECOND FOR THE WIFE.NEARLY ALL THE CHILDREN AND MANY OF THE ADULTS HAVE BICYCLES. BEVERLEY HAS OUR NEAREST SHOPPING_ CENTRE,RAILWAY AND BUS STATION. 14 DAILY BUSES LINK BEVERLEY TO WALKINGTON,BUT NONE ON SUNDAYS.OF THEM 6 GO ON TO HULL,6 HAVE COME FROM HULL, THE REST TURN AT THE VILLAGE END AND RETURN TO BEVERLEY.ON THEM SOME OF THE LOCAL VILLAGES CAN BE REACHED.A LOCAL TAXI ALSO OPERATES. 20% OF VILLAGERS ARE UNHAPPY AT CUTS IN EAST YORKSHIRE MOTOR SERVICES RUNS, PARTICULARLY THE LACK OF LATE EVENING SERVICES.8% RATE THE BUS SERVICE IN THE TOP THREE CRUCIAL LOCAL AMENITIES. THE PAROCHIAL CHURCH COUNCIL PUT THE NEW TIMETABLE IN THE VILLAGE NEWSLETTER AND ARRANGED A MEETING TO SHOW DISCONTENT.2 PEOPLE TURNED UP!!
